name: Yohack
text:
Someone...!
Someone, help...!

Perhaps due to successive strong impacts from outside,
the spaceship door, whose lock had come undone,
wouldn't budge no matter how many times I hit it.

From outside the door,
I could hear the screams of people
fleeing from the monsters that suddenly appeared in the city.

I couldn't stop trembling,
thinking that a monster might attack
even while I was like this.

name: Yohack
text:
Ugh...
Get me out of here...
Please... I beg you...

I had screamed so many times that
my own throat was crushed, leaving me unable
to make a proper sound.

It was dark and scary,
and I wanted to escape immediately,
but I couldn't find an exit anywhere.

name: Yohack
text:
Cough...
S-Someone...

name: Man's Voice
text:
—Don't worry, kid.
I'll help you right away.

The voice from beyond the door was a low one,
calmer than that would befit the critical situation.

name: Man's Voice
text:
Because you didn't give up and kept knocking on the door,
I realized there was someone left behind.

name: Man's Voice
text:
—You must have been scared,
but you did well.

name: Yohack
text:
Ugh...
I-I... cough...

The moment I heard those words,
my eyes welled up with tears
for no apparent reason.

My throat was choked with emotion,
and I couldn't even properly thank him.

Even so, the person beyond the door
repeatedly encouraged me,
who could only sob.

name: Locksmith Man
text:
I'm a locksmith, you know.
Opening a door that's stuck shut
is child's play for me.

name: Locksmith Man
text:
Remember this, kid.
As long as you don't give up,
there's always an exit.

name: Yohack
text: An, exit...

The next moment,
a dull sound of something heavy being dragged was heard,
and the spaceship door opened slightly.

In the dazzling light,
a powerfully built uncle
grinned at me.

The moment I saw that smile,
I felt that I would be saved, I truly believed it.

name: Locksmith Man
text:
—See?
Just as I said,
it was over in an instant.

name: Yohack
text:
Cough, cough...
Th-Thank you...

name: Locksmith Man
text:
It's too early to thank me.
Let's get out of here quickly.

The person who held me under his arm
effortlessly leaped over the pile of rubble
and got on a motorcycle-like machine.

And the next moment,
a strange floating sensation enveloped my entire body.

—Before I even knew it,
I was already flying in the sky.

At the edge of my vision,
the rubble collapsed and made a tremendous noise
around the area where I had been trapped just moments ago.

name: Locksmith Man
text:
—Phew.
That was a close call.
I owe my life to my "partner".

name: Locksmith Man
text:
But it's not over yet.
We still have to help those left behind.

name: Locksmith Man
text:
I'm going to speed up a bit,
so hold on tight, kid!

From that day on,
he began to aim to become a locksmith.

He traveled to Estevolta IV, where he heard his "master" lived,
and pressed his way into a locksmith shop in Estevolta—

name: Yohack
text:
—Please!
Please take me as your apprentice!

name: Locksmith Man
text:
Oh dear...
I don't usually take apprentices, you know.

name: Locksmith Man
text:
If I do say so myself,
what would you do as a locksmith?

name: Locksmith Man
text:
For a young lad like you,
there must be more suitable jobs.
There's no need to be so fixated on being a locksmith...

name: Yohack
text:
I'm very happy for your advice,
but please, somehow, I beg you...!

name: Yohack
text:
I really want to be a locksmith
like you—

name: Yohack
text:
—I want to be a locksmith
who can offer a helping hand
to people who are trapped (in trouble)!

name: Yohack
text:
Just like how you rescued
me from that dark place!

His master shrugged, then
reluctantly opened his mouth again.

name: Locksmith Man
text:
...Kid.
What's your name?

name: Yohack
text:
I'm Yohack!
Yohack Raniranza (ヨハック・ラニランザ),
from Clouge!

—And so,
after becoming an apprentice to my master,
I aimed to become a full-fledged locksmith.

Just like my master saved me,
I wanted to help people who were stuck without an exit.
But—

—No matter how much trouble they're in,
some people don't ask for help.
Some people keep everything to themselves.

In such times,
what should I do?
What can I do for them?
Chapter 5 - Selfish Kindness

name: Saotome
text:
N-No way...
Enoshiman, along with the monsters...

name: Saotome
text:
Am I having
a bad dream...?

The monsters that attacked Enoshima Village
had already vanished without a trace.

And Enoshiman, who unleashed a powerful blow
to defeat the monsters,
was nowhere to be found.

name: Enoshiman
text:
Yohack-kun.
I sincerely respect your kindness and positivity.

name: Enoshiman
text:
You are not ignorant of pain,
but a hero with the strength to endure it.
Fighting alongside you, I truly felt that.

name: Enoshiman
text:
Astar-kun.
Your unwavering will and strong body
are surely the fruits of tireless effort.

name: Enoshiman
text:
I am proud to have fought alongside you,
who possess a will to push forward towards your goal
and an unshakeable conviction.

name: Yohack
text:
Enoshiman-san protected us
and used that technique—

name: Yohack
text:
It's almost like
a farewell greeting...!

name: Astar
text:
He must have wanted to protect them.
Something important to him—
the people of Enoshima.

name: Astar
text:
And, even us who
fought alongside him...

Astar and Yohack's lament
was drowned out by Saotome's sorrowful wail.

name: Saotome
text:
It's my...!
It's all my fault...!!

Yohack and Astar couldn't hide their shock
at the tragic sight and abrupt ending.
However—

Seeing Saotome repeatedly slamming his tightly clenched fist
onto the ground, the heroes regained their composure
and called out to him.

name: Astar
text:
...Saotome.
Don't blame yourself alone.

name: Astar
text:
It's also our fault that
we let Enoshiman use such a technique.

name: Yohack
text:
If only we had defeated
the monsters sooner...

Knowing that the monsters were defeated,
the children rushed over.

name: Island Kid
text:
Hey, where did
Enoshiman go off to?

name: Island Kid
text:
Enoshiman!
Show us your victory pose!

name: Island Kid
text:
When we call him,
he usually comes right away...

Their calls echoed emptily into the void,
forcing the children to face the fact
that Enoshiman was no longer there.

name: Astar
text:
...[Player].
Can you still observe Enoshiman?

Receiving Astar's gaze,
[Player] checked their device.
The screen displayed "Connection Lost".

options.text: There's no reaction from the device...

name: Saotome
text:
In other words...
Enoshiman is already...

name: Yohack
text:
...It's too early to give up!
Enoshiman-san shouldn't have been
eaten by a monster.

name: Yohack
text:
Because if he had been eaten,
Enoshiman-san's name wouldn't be coming
from the villagers' mouths...!

name: Astar
text:
...His strength is guaranteed.
He wouldn't fall so easily.

name: Astar
text:
Believing that Enoshiman is alive,
we can only do what we can now.

name: Astar
text:
Evacuation of villagers and tourists,
and monster patrol will also be necessary.
This is not the time to stand still.

name: Saotome
text:
I-I see...
You're right...

name: Saotome
text:
...Everyone is right.
For the sake of everyone in Enoshima,
I can't be disheartened.

name: Saotome
text:
Anyway, let's think about what's next—
No, ensuring everyone's safety comes first.

name: Saotome
text:
I don't see Shiratori-kun, but
he must be moving nearby too.
Once we meet up, we need to think about the next step.

Saotome, with a grim expression contrary to his words,
gritted his teeth and stood up,
then began issuing evacuation instructions to the villagers.

And, as [Player] and the others
were guiding the villagers to safety,
Alend and the others returned to the village.

They were leading the tourists and villagers
who had been playing on the beach.

name: Alend
text:
[Player]...
Sorry for being late.
We were held up by the monsters.

name: Senthak
text:
Sorry, [Player]-kun.
If we had rushed here sooner...

options.text: Good work on your end too.

name: Joezen
text:
[Player]-san...
I heard the report. Many large monsters
appeared, and then... that...

name: Kiloc
text:
...Joezen, take a deep breath.
It's not decided yet.
We can't afford to be flustered.

name: Kiloc
text:
However... in this chaotic situation,
to protect the villagers with such a small number of people.
As expected of you, [Player]-chan.

options.text: It's because everyone did their best.

text:
Hearing the name Enoshiman,
the heroes wore solemn expressions.

name: Kiloc
text:
...Ah, I heard from Yohack.
Enoshiman, he's still missing, right?

name: Joezen
text:
Enoshiman-san...
I hope he's safe.

The heroes, who had reassembled in the village,
continued to be vigilant against monsters
and gathered the villagers and tourists in one place.

Avoiding the buildings collapsed by monsters,
they headed to the village office,
which had suffered minor damage.

And, by the time the evacuation was settled,
it had become completely dark.

name: Saotome
text:
Everyone, thank you for working hard
until this late hour.

name: Saotome
text:
If EnoRail could operate,
we could have evacuated the tourists, but
in this situation...

EnoRail had suspended operations,
as the extent of the monster damage
was unknown.

Saotome announced the situation,
looking apologetic.

name: Saotome
text:
And, I'm truly sorry.
Because I did something unnecessary,
it ended up in a terrible commotion.

name: Saotome
text:
Far from revitalizing Enoshima,
I've brought about a result
that's almost the worst possible...

name: Saotome
text:
My own wish has
hurt many people...
And then...

name: Astar
text:
...I don't think your struggle
to fulfill your wish is unnecessary.

name: Yohack
text:
It's not unnecessary at all.
Saotome-san, you've worked hard
for your precious hometown...

name: Yohack
text:
Saotome-san, it is out of your own
kindness to desire for everyone in the
village to live happily, isn't it?

name: Saotome
text:
...Even if that's true,
the result is undeniably this.

name: Saotome
text:
Besides, it would be a lie if I said that
there was no ego in my desire to
make Enoshima enjoyable.

name: Saotome
text:
That ego...
That is what have caused
Enoshiman to go missing.

options.text: (Remember what happened at the village office)

name: Shiratori
text:
It pains me greatly to ask this
right after meeting you, but...

name: Shiratori
text:
Please, could you keep my true identity
a secret...?

name: Shiratori
text:
If it's known that a plain person like me
is Enoshiman, the children's dreams
might be shattered...

name: Shiratori
text:
...Therefore,
I would like you to think of me
as just "Shiratori".

options.text: Let's believe that he's still alive.

dialogue_after_selection.text:
Even after hearing [Player]'s words,
Saotome's expression didn't brighten.

name: Yohack
text:
It's alright, Saotome-san!
We will definitely rescue
Enoshiman-san!

name: Saotome
text:
No, Yohack-kun.
I appreciate the sentiment, but...

name: Saotome
text:
I don't want to involve you all any further.
Please don't overexert yourselves.

name: Saotome
text:
I don't want anyone else
to be sacrificed for Enoshima.

name: Yohack
text:
Saotome-san...
...........

Some time later,
[Player] visited a makeshift
temporary clinic.

From the brutally destroyed village clinic,
the barely salvaged medical equipment was gathered
in a corner of the village office.

name: Yohack
text:
—Ah!
[Player]-san!

name: Yohack
text:
Could it be that you came to check on me
because you were worried?
Thank you!

name: Yohack
text:
I've also received treatment,
so I'm completely fine now!

name: Yohack
text:
Even if monsters appear again,
I can fight perfectly!

Yohack, who said that and
acted cheerfully as usual—

—That cheerfulness, on the contrary,
created an indescribable sense of unease.
[Player] sensed it.

name: Yohack
text:
Ahaha...
It seems that I cannot deceive
your eyes after all, [Player]-san.

name: Yohack
text:
Precisely because it's a time like this,
I, as a hero, must be smiling.

Yohack scratched his cheek,
with a troubled smile.

Then, after a moment of hesitation,
he slowly began to speak.

name: Yohack
text:
It might sound strange coming from me, but
for Enoshima now that Enoshiman-san is gone...

name: Yohack
text:
I think "we" are the
last remaining support.

name: Yohack
text:
But if I'm feeling down,
it will surely make everyone anxious.
...I don't want to do that.

Yohack's expression as he looked down,
was tinged with definite sorrow.

options.text: I think you're very admirable, but...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's not true.
That's what I wanted myself to be, but I'm not actually doing anything to fulfill it.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Thank you for your concern.
But, as a hero, I can't be like this...

text:
[Player] witnessed Yohack,
who rarely showed weakness.

dialogue_after_selection.text: [Player] faced the depressed Yohack and gave him a smile.
Choosing their words carefully, [Player] smiled at Yohack.

[Player] smiled at Yohack,
who looked at them in surprise.

text:
It was a declaration of intent to fulfill
the mission of an "Observer",
who supports heroes.

name: Yohack
text: [Player]-san...!

The sight of [Player] reaching out to him in his suffering,
overlapped with the image of the hero Yohack himself aspired to be.

His words, observing the path to realizing his wish
and trying to walk it together, shone a light
into Yohack's soft heart.

name: Yohack
text:
...As expected,
[Player]-san, you are amazing.

name: Yohack
text:
With you, I'm sure, that no matter how
thick the wall can be, we'll overcome it together!
That's what I'm feeling!

options.text: I haven't done anything yet, though.

name: Yohack
text:
Ehehe...
Thank you.
[Player]-san.

Yohack, as if making up his mind,
opened his mouth towards [Player].

name: Yohack
text:
[Player]-san.
Will you listen to my story?

name: Yohack
text:
[Player]-san,
there's something I really want to consult with you,
for you who have always supported me.

options.text: I'll listen to you as much as you like!

name: Yohack
text:
Ehehe. [Player]-san,
I thought you'd say that,
so I was a bit selfish.

name: Yohack
text:
Well then, since we're here,
why don't we go outside?
I want to do a patrol too.

[Player] nodded, and followed Yohack
out of the makeshift clinic.

name: Yohack
text:
...Right now, I think Saotome-san
is having the hardest time.

name: Yohack
text:
Saotome-san will surely say
that's not true, but-

As Yohack said that,
he casually looked around
to check if the subject of their conversation was nearby.

options.text: (Did he not want this conversation to be overheard?)

name: Yohack
text:
He's taking on the burden of the monsters
and Enoshiman-san's disappearance,
thinking it's all his fault.

name: Yohack
text:
Even though that's not true,
I want him to rely on others,
but he's trying to handle everything by himself.

name: Yohack
text:
—I really want to help such people,
people who are stuck without an exit.

Hearing Yohack's earnest words,
[Player] remembered a certain person.

name: Yohack
text:
Astosis-san at that time
was carrying the problems happening
in Clouge all by himself.

name: Yohack
text:
...I think
I understand.

name: Yohack
text:
Astosis-san didn't think
I was unreliable or that he didn't like me.

name: Yohack
text:
Rather, precisely because he cared
for me as a childhood friend,
that he acted alone.

name: Yohack
text: But—

Yohack's eyes welled up with tears,
and he clenched his fist tightly.

name: Yohack
text:
Even so, I wanted to be
of more help to Astosis-san.
I wanted him to rely on me from the start.

name: Yohack
text:
I wanted to take on even a small part
of Astosis-san's painful feelings.

name: Yohack
text:
—Is it still selfish
to think that way?

Yohack, who usually behaved brightly and bravely,
and encouraged his comrades, now showed
a gloomy expression he rarely displayed.

Witnessing that,
[Player] thought.

What words should they say to Yohack,
who still wanted to help someone who wasn't asking for it,
someone who was suffering alone.

options.text: It's okay to be selfish, isn't it?
Because you really want to help, don't you?

name: Yohack
text: [Player]-san...?

options.text: If they say it's a nuisance...

name: Yohack
text:
[Player]-san...
With me...?

Yohack took [Player]'s words
with surprise.

Even if they're bothered, he'll help because he wants to.
And he'll accept the consequences together—

name: Yohack
text:
I never thought of that.
To push through my own selfishness...

name: Yohack
text:
But, that's right.
Even if helping causes trouble,
that's not the end of it.

name: Yohack
text:
Even so, if we stand up again,
and solve the next problem—

options.text: If we do it together, it's surely possible.
We'll just have to take responsibility until the end!

name: Yohack
text:
Ehehe! I completely understand!
If we help beyond the point of being a nuisance,
everything will be resolved!

name: Yohack
text:
Then, instead of brooding here,
I'll go for it with a "nothing ventured, nothing gained" spirit...!
I'll give it my all!

name: Yohack
text:
Because that's the kind
of locksmith I wanted to be!

Immediately after Yohack declared that,
[Player]'s device emitted a red light.
It was a faint glow of new possibilities.

name: Yohack
text: Eh, what's wrong, [Player]-san—

name: Yohack
text: —Huh, what's this light!?

options.text: We might be able to give shape to your wish, Yohack-san.
I think I can help you do what you want even more now.
I saw the same light back in Clouge.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I remembered too!
It's the same light as Nessen-san's back then...!

text:
The red flash gradually faded.
However, [Player] clearly observed
the outline of the path.

options.text: When the time calls for it, I can surely approve it.
I'll give shape to your wish, Yohack-san.

name: Yohack
text:
Thank you...
It's incredibly reassuring...!

name: Yohack
text:
It's truly good that
you are here with me, [Player]-san.

A ray of light shone through a desperate situation.
The two, witnessing it—

—Renewed their resolve to help Enoshima Village,
and by extension, Saotome.

And, the next morning, which they were able to greet safely,
without the feared appearance of monsters.

With no prospect of EnoRail resuming operation,
and tourist evacuation seemingly difficult,
[Player] and the others began to act.

To cover a wide area of the village and ensure safety,
the heroes split into three teams
and patrolled Enoshima Village.

name: Astar
text:
Since then, the appearance of monsters
has calmed down, but
we can't let our guard down.

name: Yohack
text:
That's right...!
To protect everyone in the village,
we have to do our best!

name: Saotome
text:
Astar-kun,
Yohack-kun...
Actually—

name: Saotome
text:
(I haven't seen Shiratori-kun since yesterday,
but... I don't want to overwork
the heroes any more than this.)

name: Saotome
text:
(I'll manage the villagers myself.
I'll surely find him.)

Saotome, looking troubled, swallowed the words
that were about to spill out, and tried to act
as if nothing was wrong.

name: Saotome
text:
—Everyone in the village was grateful to you.
Thank you very much,
Astar-kun, Yohack-kun.

And, a few hours after
starting their patrol.

name: Kiloc
text:
[Player]-chan!
We have some troublesome guests here,
so I'm just letting you know!

name: Joezen
text:
It's a manageable number for me and Captain,
but please be careful on your end too!

As [Player] was about to rush to Kiloc's aid,
a message came in from Alend.

name: Alend
text:
Monsters have appeared on the west side of the village.
We'll deal with them now, but
are things alright on your end?

name: Senthak
text:
We'll take care of things here!
Judging from yesterday, monsters
might appear on your side too!

name: Yohack
text:
This is bad...!
To think they'd all appear at once!

name: Astar
text:
We should be vigilant too.
[Player], tell me immediately if you feel
the presence of monsters.

Receiving Astar's words,
[Player] sharpened their senses.

And [Player] felt a faint premonition
in the center of the village.

options.text: Let's head to the center of the village!

text:
Receiving [Player]'s words,
the group moved at full speed to the center of the village.

And, shortly after their arrival,
monsters appeared from the void.

name: Yohack
text:
We barely made it!
Now, we'll protect
everyone in the village!

name: Astar
text:
[Player]...!
I'm counting on your observation!

name: Saotome
text:
Everyone,
don't overexert yourselves...

name: Kiloc
text:
Monsters appearing northwest!
Joezen, stop them!

name: Joezen
text:
Understood, Captain!
I won't let them go any further!
Take this!

The gust of wind raised by Joezen
stopped the monsters' advance.

name: Kiloc
text:
Good, Joezen!
Leave the finishing blow to me!

name: Alend
text:
No entry beyond this point.
Sorry, but please leave!

name: Senthak
text:
Alright!
I'll wipe them all out!

Senthak threw a hologram
towards the monsters, who were blocked by
the translucent wall created by Alend.

The monsters seemed to have been annihilated
by the exploding hologram, but—

name: Senthak
text:
Whoa, a second wave just came!
At this rate, we'll never
be able to go help!

name: Alend
text:
Calm down, Senthak.
We can't solve everything at once,
so let's finish the tasks in front of us first.

name: Senthak
text:
Th-That's true, but...
...Everyone, please be safe.

name: Yohack
text:
Ugh...!
There's no end to defeating them!

name: Astar
text:
Is this what they call overwhelming numbers?
It's quite a tough situation, but...

name: Astar
text:
Alend and the others are also fighting back.
We have to deal with this by ourselves...!

name: Saotome
text:
...Am I again
only able to watch
the heroes get hurt?

[Player] and the others, who were fighting back
while protecting the buildings,
were having a very hard time.

name: Monster
text: Guoooooh!!

options.text: It's hard to fight inside the village...

text:
The gradually accumulating fatigue and damage
were hindering the heroes' movements.

Taking advantage of that opening,
an matured monster gradually approached
the village office—

—The building where the villagers and tourists
were evacuated to.

name: Saotome
text: That alone...!

At that moment,
Saotome moved faster than anyone else.

He pulled out a flag—the flag Shiratori had been carrying—
from among the flags erected throughout the village,
and ran towards the monster, swinging it around.

name: Saotome
text:
That alone is unacceptable...!
No one else will be harmed by monsters...!

name: Saotome
text:
Yuto, the villagers,
and the heroes too!
I won't let you hurt them anymore!

A dark shadow, akin to resignation,
appeared on Saotome's face.

Astar recognized
that expression.

name: Astar
text:
He's like me back then,
and Monomasa back then.

name: Astar
text:
[Player]!
We have to stop Saotome!

Astar's voice, as he clenched his fist
and shouted, was tinged with
agitation and impatience.

Hearing that voice,
[Player] nodded greatly.

Saotome, who had rushed to the front lines,
shouted loudly while swinging the flag.

name: Saotome
text:
If it's people that you wanted to eat so much,
then go for me first!
Come on, come this way!

Saotome swung the flag widely,
attracting the monster's attention, and
ran towards the outskirts of the village.

name: Saotome
text:
If I can lure them outside the village,
it'll be a bit easier to fight!

name: Saotome
text:
I can't just stand by
and watch you all get hurt
anymore!

name: Yohack
text:
Saotome-san!
That's reckless!

name: Astar
text:
...It's useless, Yohack.
He's already made up his mind.

name: Astar
text:
More precisely,
he can't find any other options.

name: Astar
text:
He believes that he can only fulfill
his responsibility by sacrificing himself.

name: Astar
text:
I know what kind of actions
someone who believes that will take.

name: Yohack
text:
Saotome-san...!
With such a sad feeling,
he's carrying everything alone...!

name: Yohack
text:
I don't want anyone else
to feel that way anymore...!

—The moment Yohack muttered that,
[Player]'s device reacted, and
a red flash ran across it again.

options.text: That path from before, it's stronger...!
Yohack-san, it's reacting to your wish...!

name: Yohack
text:
Please, [Player]-san!
Give me the power to save Saotome-san!

name: Yohack
text:
Even if Saotome-san doesn't ask me for help,
even if he doesn't want to be helped—

name: Yohack
text:
—I want to push through with my selfishness!
Putting everything I can into it!

options.text: If we get scolded, we'll apologize together!

name: Mobile Device
text:
—Connect to path?
To start operation,
tap "OK".

[Player] pulled Yohack's wish
from the parallel universe.
And, a dazzling red light enveloped the surroundings—

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
This is the form
of my other wish...!

When the light subsided,
Yohack stood, clad in a lifeguard-like suit.

Behind him,
a Parallel Weapon shaped
like a jet ski floated.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
This is what Master
rode back then...!

Flickering in Yohack's mind was the motorcycle-like
vehicle his master rode when he rescued him,
soaring through the air.

However, the Parallel Weapon's shape
also resembled the jet ski he rode
in Enoshima.

Witnessing that sight,
Astar remembered.

How new Santas
gained new forms on Christmas night.

name: Astar
text:
A new interpretation of a dream's form,
observed by [Player]...!

name: Astar
text:
...I see.
To think it was a "sleigh".

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ehehe!
When you praise me, I feel a bit embarrassed, but...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text: More than that, I feel like I can try even harder!

options.text: Yohack-san, this is the form of your dream...!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
[Player]-san!
Thank you!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
With this power observed by [Player]-san,
I will rescue Saotome-san!

Yohack, having declared himself,
straddled the jet ski-shaped
Parallel Weapon.

And, accelerating to full throttle,
he flew straight towards Saotome,
who was about to be caught by the monsters—

—Ignoring rock walls and houses,
he flew in a straight line, literally.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
There's no need for that!
Because if this is the form of my wish—

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
I should be able to reach
beyond any wall!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
So, [Player]-san!
Please believe in me!

Yohack, receiving ViewPower from [Player],
charged forward, his jet ski glowing.

And, splashing water as he went,
he broke through all obstacles.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
"Unlocking"!
Omnes Exitus!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Saotome-san!
It's alright now!
I will definitely save you!

Yohack extended his hand to Saotome,
with the brightest smile he could muster.

Just as his Master, and [Player],
had smiled to encourage him.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Come on, Saotome-san!
Reach out your hand!

name: Saotome
text: Y-Yohack-kun...!

Yohack firmly grasped
Saotome's outstretched arm.

He then put Saotome on his back,
and returned to [Player]'s side
while dodging the monster's attacks.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Ehehe!
The moment I gripped the handle,
I somehow understood.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
If there's anything in the way of helping someone,
I can surely break through it!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
...[Player]-san made
me believe that.

And, he set Saotome down
next to [Player].

name: Saotome
text:
...Yohack-kun.
I, if it's for everyone's sake,
it doesn't matter what happens to me—

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
—Saotome-san.
To sacrifice yourself excessively,
that is not atonement.

name: Astar
text:
You yourself should already know what
those who were left behind will feel,
you can't possibly not know.

name: Astar
text:
Are you planning to make Yuto and the villagers
experience the same feelings?

name: Saotome
text:
To those left behind...
I...

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Enoshiman-san
fought monsters because he
wanted to protect you all.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
And yet,
Saotome-san, if you were to be
eaten by a monster in this way...

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
This time, we would truly
never see Enoshiman-san
again, wouldn't we?

name: Saotome
text:
Yohack-kun...
You're... right...

name: Astar
text:
Do you understand, Saotome?
Whether you act recklessly or not,
we will help you.

name: Astar
text:
We could have always cooperated from the start.
Because, after all, we are a team
that pulls the same sleigh.

name: Saotome
text:
Astar-kun...
You all, truly...

name: Astar
text:
...The rest of the reflection session can wait.
Now, we must focus on
removing the obstacle before us.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Understood, [Player]-san!
I'll take everyone to the exit of this battle
at full speed!
Battle Start

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Now, let's end this!
"Unlock"!
Omnes Exitus!

Yohack, who moved freely through the village,
unfazed by obstacles, toyed with the monsters.

And with that, thanks to the heroes' efforts,
Enoshima Village was safely protected.

options.text: I'm glad it worked out somehow...

name: Astar
text:
...A "sleigh" that flies through the air,
and the ability to break through obstacles, huh.

name: Astar
text:
Hmph, it seems my eyes weren't mistaken.
His aptitude as "Santa-san"
has been further refined.

name: Astar
text:
—Splendid, Yohack.
I shall recognize you as an intermediate
"Santa-san apprentice".

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
I-Intermediate!?
"Santa-san apprentice"...?
Astar-san, isn't that your-?

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Anyway, he's praising me...
Right?
Ah, thank you!

Saotome, who had been watching the battle,
bowed deeply towards [Player] and the others.

name: Saotome
text:
I'm truly sorry.
Yohack-kun, Astar-kun.
And you too, [Player]-kun.

name: Saotome
text:
To do such a thing,
and cause everyone worry and burden...

name: Saotome
text:
...Even so,
thank you very much
for helping me like this.

Unlike yesterday, when he seemed somewhat distressed,
Saotome expressed his gratitude with a frank smile.

name: Astar
text:
...Hmph.
Your expression looks a bit better now.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Saotome-san, thank you
for taking my hand!

name: Saotome
text:
...As expected,
you local heroes are amazing.

name: Saotome
text:
You don't give up in any situation,
and keep on facing difficulties.
I want to be like that too.

Saotome, muttering,
clenched his trembling fist and
took a deep breath.

name: Saotome
text:
To regret, that's something that can always happen.
If I try everything and it still doesn't work,
then I'll have no choice but to depressed, but...

name: Saotome
text:
Now is not that time yet.
I will still stubbornly struggle.

In Saotome's eyes, upon declaring it,
a light of determination resided.

And,
there was a faint reaction
on [Player]'s device.

name: Mobile Device
text:
New path detected.
Target: Saotome
Strength: Very Weak

The reaction was fleeting,
the faint light quickly disappeared.

Even so,
a strong light resided in Saotome's eyes,
who had stood up again.

The same strong will as the heroes,
never to give up.

name: Shiratori
text:
Ugh...!
Th-This place...?

name: Shiratori
text:
The same beach as that time?
Why am I...?

name: Shiratori
text:
No, the reason can wait.
More importantly, I...
I have something I must do...!

Shiratori, who woke up on the beach,
stood up, protected his body, and
began to walk away in unsteady steps.
